Get all genetic data for a study or list of IDs

get_genetics.Rd

Get all genetic data for a study or list of IDs

get_genetics(
  sample_ids = NULL,
  study_id = NULL,
  genes = NULL,
  panel = NULL,
  mutations = TRUE,
  fusions = TRUE,
  cna = TRUE,
  seg = FALSE
)

Arguments

sample_ids

A character vector of sample ids
study_id

A character vector of length 1 specifying study to query. See get_studies() to see list of available studies.
genes

A list of genes to query. default is all impact genes.
panel

OPTIONAL argument. A character vector of length 1 indicating a specific panel to be used. If not NULL, the panel will be looked up with get_panel() and only genes in that panel will be returned.
mutations

Boolean specifying if mutation data should be fetched. Default is TRUE.
fusions

Boolean specifying if fusion data should be fetched. Default is TRUE.
cna

Boolean specifying if cna data should be fetched. Default is TRUE.
seg

Boolean specifying if segmentation data should be fectched. Default is FALSE.

Value

A list of dataframes containing genetic data.

Examples

if (FALSE) {
# IMPACT #
get_genetics(sample_ids = c("P-0000004-T01-IM3", "P-0000012-T02-IM3"),
genes = 207)

# TCGA #
get_genetics(sample_ids =  c("TCGA-17-Z023-01","TCGA-02-0003-01","TCGA-02-0055-01"),
 database = "tcga")
}
